products.name: Cashmere- Blend Jacket
products.description: Introducing the Brunello Cucinelli Cashmere-Blend Jacket - a stunning addition to your outerwear collection. This luxurious jacket showcases the exquisite craftsmanship and sustainability that Brunello Cucinelli is renowned for. Constructed with a rich blend of cashmere, cotton, and elastane, this jacket offers both comfort and style. The jacket features a sleek blue color with a corduroy design, adding a touch of sophistication to your ensemble. The bomber collar adds a modern twist, while the dual front pockets provide practicality and storage space. Measuring approximately 29 inches from shoulder to hem, this jacket offers a flattering fit. The model, standing at 6'2.5, is wearing a size Medium, highlighting its versatility for various body types. Please note that measurements may slightly vary by size. Designed with convenience in mind, this jacket features a practical zipper front closure, allowing easy on and off. Handwashing is recommended to maintain the quality of the fabric. Handcrafted in Italy, this Brunello Cucinelli jacket represents the epitome of Italian luxury. Known for their beautifully-crafted cashmere pieces, the brand has been celebrated by GQ as the Designer of the Year in 2021. With their attention to detail and sustainability, Brunello Cucinelli has established itself as a premier luxury brand. Rest assured that when you choose our products, you are receiving 100% genuine merchandise. While we occasionally source from trusted independent suppliers, we guarantee the authenticity of every product sold on our site. Elevate your style and indulge in the luxurious comfort of the Brunello Cucinelli Cashmere-Blend Jacket. Shop now and experience the pinnacle of Italian luxury.

products.name: Mens Smoky Adolon Junior Woven-blend and Suede Low-top Trainers
products.brandedName: Christian Louboutin Mens Smoky Adolon Junior Woven-blend and Suede Low-top Trainers
products.unbrandedName: Mens Smoky Adolon Junior Woven-blend and Suede Low-top Trainers
products.description: When it comes to footwear aficionado Christian Louboutin, the highest heels and the skinniest stilettos aren't the only thing the designer has up his sleeve. Take the Adolon Junior silhouette, for example. A classic pair of trainers, inspired by sporty style codes, their low-top profile is set on top of a bouncer rubber sole. With details kept to a minimum, they're accented only by a contrasting side panel that's splashed in the label's iconic scarlet hue.| 55% linen, 40% cotton, 5% suede Made in Italy True to size Product care – The red lacquer of the soles wears out with use. This is not a manufacturing defect; it is simply normal wear and tear. Christian Louboutin strongly recommends that its customers consult a professional in leather care or a shoemaker for specific care advice. In order to keep your shoes in good condition, the following leather care is recommended:Keep the leather area clean and dry using a dry, soft cloth Always store your products away from light and heat Protect your leather goods from rain and moisture Store your products in the Christian Louboutin dust bag provided Avoid contact with abrasive surfaces Regrettably we are unable to accept in-store returns on Christian Louboutin orders PLEASE NOTE: Due to the delicate nature of the red soles we ask that the shoes be tried on carpeted flooring. If not, they may not be suitable for return

products.name: Ralph Lauren PRL x Naiomi Glasses Denim Western Shirt
products.brandedName: Ralph Lauren PRL x Naiomi Glasses Denim Western Shirt
products.unbrandedName: PRL x Naiomi Glasses Denim Western Shirt
products.description: Presenting the Polo Ralph Lauren x Naiomi Glasses collection the inaugural collaboration of the Ralph Lauren Artist in Residence program reflecting our evolved design approach with the artisans and communities that inspire us. The Polo Ralph Lauren x Naiomi Glasses collection honors Navajo heritage and centuries-old weaving traditions. Naiomi Glasses is a seventh-generation Diné (Navajo) textile artist and designer whose work reflects the beauty of her Indigenous culture. Through the first drop in this collection Naiomi draws inspiration from her family homelands and community on Dinétah (Navajo Nation). This unisex denim Western shirt is proudly made in America and features four-directional cross embroidery in a hue that complements its pearlized snaps. The four-directional cross and the number four carry great significance in Navajo tradition as well as in other Native communities. They reference the Earth's four directions and the stars.

Move with Confidence:Woven fabric feels smooth and lightweight, plus an exaggerated gusset helps you get the most out of your leg movement. A low-profile waistband lays flat against the skin. products.description: Focus on what matters and never worry about what to wear with the Nike Tour top. This 1/2-zip layer is made with soft, sweat-wicking fabric so you can stay fresh through all 18 holes. With a relaxed fit and stand-up collar, it's easy to layer over your classic polo. The print is inspired by the textures we see on the course—like rake lines in the sand traps. Just avoid the real thing, if you can. Advanced Sweat-Wicking:Nike Dri-FIT ADV technology combines moisture-wicking fabric with advanced engineering and features to help you stay dry and comfortable. Cool Comfort:Stretch-knit fabric provides lightweight warmth and breathability—an ideal layer when the conditions get cool. Layering Made Easy:The classic 1/2-zip design and stand-up collar are designed to easily layer against your golf polo. Product Details:Raglan sleeve construction. Body: 87% polyester/13% spandex. products.name: 2pc Wool Suit
products.description: Introducing the Canali 2pc Wool Suit - the epitome of elegance and sophistication. Crafted by the renowned brand Canali, known for their impeccable tailoring and wearable designs, this suit is a must-have addition to any man's wardrobe.In a rich navy color, this suit is timeless and versatile, suitable for any occasion. The jacket features a notch lapel, left chest pocket, and two front pockets, providing both style and functionality. With side vents at the back hem, the jacket allows for comfortable movement throughout the day. The two-button closure adds a touch of class to the overall design.The accompanying pants are designed with belt loops and classic five-pocket styling, ensuring convenience and practicality. The zip fly with button closure provides a secure and comfortable fit. The unfinished hem allows for easy tailoring, ensuring a perfect fit tailored to your personal measurements.Made from 100% wool shell and lined with 100% Cupro, this suit is created with the utmost attention to detail and quality. Dry clean only, this suit is easy to maintain, ensuring its longevity.For the modern gentleman, this Canali 2pc Wool Suit exudes confidence and style. The model is 6'2 and wearing a size 50, but please note that measurements may vary slightly by size.Indulge in the luxurious craftsmanship of Canali and elevate your wardrobe with this sophisticated suit. Made in Italy, it reflects the brand's commitment to excellence. Embrace elegance and make a sartorial statement with the Canali 2pc Wool Suit.
